event.text: I think I found a bunch of berries on a bush.
From up close they don't seem so tasty as they used to. I'd better leave them.
They are sour and I don't feel so good. This was a mistake.
Eating them was a mistake. I think I'm gonna throw up.

I'm pretty sure that I saw a plant similar to that one here in many databases. The one I saw had healing properties so I guess this will have them too. Despite of harsh taste, I feel fresh energy filling my body and hunger seems to have gone right away.
I see a really odd plant. It has unregular shape and unhealthy colour. I'd better leave it undisturbed.
Oh, what's that smell? It seems to come from this fern. Strange, there is a bit of greenish fog around it.
It might be dangerous. I'd better step off.
I got a bit dizzy from this smell. I think I'm going to vommit.
Uh... I feel miserable... I can't stand on my feet. I'm gonna throw up.
My wounds start to itch more than ever probably 'cause of this fog. I'd better keep distance.
Ouch! My wounds burn! I feel how the fire spreads in my veins!
My god! What a pain! What happened?! I'm dying from the inside!
I need help... I don't think I can move anymore. My skin is tearing and blood is flowing from my wounds. If i die here at least bury my body.
I feel so disasterous that I would rather like to die... My wounds... My wounds are spreading all over my body. I feel it... My body is falling apart.
Oh crap! A branch almost fell on me!
Oh! A branch fell and almost landed on me! I've got just a scratch.
Woah! A branch hit the ground right next to me! I just got some scratches. Lucky me!
Ouch... My back... A branch fell on me...
Wow. What an unusual plant! It's all purple!
Hey! It has some fruits! And they are so sweet! I'm gonna take some.
I'm not sure if touching it is safe. I'll leave it alone.
Huh? What's that? Oh it's an Aetherite rock! Nice!
Shh... There is a great lizard on that tree!
It did not notice me. Maybe I can hunt it down?
It appears that Redneck Lizards have sharp claws. But I got it!
Man, that lizard was so stubborn! But I took care of it anyway.
Damn it! It managed to cut my armour with its sharp claws and escaped into the wilderness.
Damn! It saw me. It spitted something on me that dissolved my suit like it was made of paper! And that lizard took advantage of my astonishment and ran away.
Phew. Somehow it didn't see me and I could back off.
Oh crap! It saw me! It spitted something on me that dissolved my suit like it was made of paper! I was so astonished that I let that lizard escape.
Wow... What an unusual sight! Everything is completly covered by some yellow dust! Everything! Trees, rocks, grass!
My sensors are running crazy! This substance appears to be some kind of spores glued to each other and analysis shows that it is toxic. Fortunetely I'm protected.
Strange, my skin starts to itch. I guess it's because of this substance. I'd rather go around this place.
Ugh... This substance is sticky and it's all over me! It doesn't want to go off and starts to warm up. Shit! My skin is starting to boil inside!
Ugh... This substance is sticky and it's all over me! It doesn't want to go off and starts to warm up. Shit! My skin is starting to boil inside!
Ugh... It has covered me too! It's so sickening... My skin starts to burn! I have to take it off!

Oh man! This plant's leaves are enormous! Chemical analisis says they should be eatable. Mmm... They are delicious! I almost feel how new energy travels through my body. Unfortunetely they are to big to carry them with me.
I feel really unfamiliar in this forest. I hope this mission is towards its end.

encounter.name: Aetherite Rock Beneath a Fracture in Dead Tree

event.text: There is a huge dead tree.
It's partially fractured. Maybe I will find something inside? Yes! It's a nice piece of Aetherite!
It's partially fractured. Maybe I will find something inside? Meh... Should've guessed it. There's nothing here.
It can collapse in any minute. I'd rather back off.
Oh fuck! That root just moved! I'm sure of that! Oh shit! It grabbed my leg!
It pulls me to what it seems to be its maw, a disgusting stench is almost unbearable.
You messed with the wrong person, plant. It's finally dead. I'll have to watch out for thing like it in the future.
It started to consume my foot, but I killed it in time. Man, what other strange creatures live in this forest?
Holy crap, I freed my leg from its grip. I'll have to watch out next time.
It started to consume my foot, but I started kicking and shaking with my leg which loosened the grip and made me free. Never more...

Oh crap! It's pulling me towards what it seems to be a maw! Shit! The stench is horrible! And it tries to digest my foot! I have to free myself!... Ugh... C'mon!... Ok, I'm free but my foot is a bit harmed and hurts from time to time. I have to be careful.

Oh crap! It's pulling me towards what it seems to be a maw! Shit! The stench is horrible! And it tries to digest my foot! I have to free myself!... Ugh... C'mon!... Ok, I'm free but my foot is a bit harmed and hurts from time to time. Wait... Do you hear me? Oh shit... The communication module must've hit something when I was pulling myself out of this shit...
A cliff got in my way. Surely there should be some way around it but maybe there is something up there. I only need some climbing tools.
Climbing up really warmed me up! It's really satisfying.
Oh! there is a bush with grapelike fruits up there! I'll take some.
Unfortunetely there is nothing interesting here. At least I don't have to walk around.
Ough... My back... I underestimated the distance between my hand and a rock I wanted to hang on which resulted in a painful fall. I'm fine, I guess. Yet, it was close.
I guess I'm fit enough to climb it without support of equipment. Wow! Climbing it really warmed me up!
Oh! There is a bush with grapelike fruits up there! I'll take some with me.

Maybe I don't have any climbing equipment but I'm sure that I can climb it the traditional way. Ough... My chest... My foot slipped from a rock that served as abutment which ended up in a spectacular fall. I guess I'm fine now. It just scared crap of me.
There's no way I can climb it without them. Meh... I guess I'll have to find a way around.
Oh, there's a nice cavern over here. I bet there is something down there.
With a light source it will be a lot safer.
Oh yeah! Guess it's a lucky day for me! Someone lost backpack in this cavern but it's mine now!
You... You won't believe it. It is a cave full of Aetherite. What a marvelous glimmer! Enough talking. Someone is gonna collect it all.

Oh it's pretty slippy down here. Shit!... Oh... My arm! A sharp stone must had cut it. But what's this? It is a cave full of Aetherite! What a hypnotising sight! Gotta collect as much as I can and leave this cave as soon as possible.

The stone is wet. I hope not to slide from it. Damn!... My arm! It hurts alot but it doesn't seem to be broken. At least I hope so. Oh, there is some Aetherite. Judging by its size, it wasn't worth the risk but at least it's something.
Damn. I wish I had something to light up this cave. I even can't see if there is anything interesting down there. I think it's not worth taking the risk. I hate such situations so much.

We won't know if we don't check it. I goes pretty nice... Oh shit!... Damn... I feel like something has broken inside of me... I hope I can crawl out of this damned hole... OK, somehow I managed to get out of there but my backpack is somewhere down in the darkness. I won't even try to bring it back.
Huh? I think I heard a roar. Really loud. A big animal could've roared this way. I'd better turn back.
Huh? I think I heard a roar. Really loud and what is worse close to me!
I have to stay in these bushes. Whatever it is, it shouldn't be able to sense me. Oh! There's a little bit of Aetherite. Just remember, no sudden moves.
Shit! It's closer than I would like to. I have to run!... OK, I'm on the safe distance. Oh crap, my backpack was open! I hope that nothing value had been lost.
Shit! I'm not sure but I think that I saw it! That's enough! Run for your life!... Oh crap, my backpack was open! I hope that nothing valuable was lost.

Shit! I saw it! It's huge and looks like a creature from a horror film! That's enough! I have to run! Oh fuck! It's chasing me! It's faster! Aaahh! Help me! No!... Wait... what? Why did it leave me? Guess my suit didn't taste good. Lucky me... Lucky indeed...
Oh shit! There's a beast coming. I have to run until it isn't too late!... Oh crap, I lost something during my escape. Nevermind, I won't go back no matter what.

Shhh, I see a great creature. It looks like a predator and I surely don't want to be its prey. I have some food in my backpack. If I threw it, the best would have been distracted and I would escape. It's a good plan. One, Two, Three, Go!... OK, I'm in a safe distance. Time to continue exploration.
Oh shit! There is some huge animal coming! I'm prepared for fight!... It was less dangerous than it seemed. At least it has some meat inside.
Oh shit! There is some huge animal coming! I'm prepared for fight!... The fight was tough, I've got some scratches, but in the end the stronger suvived. Splitterhounds are eatable, aren't they?

Oh shit! There is some huge animal coming! I'm prepared for fight!... Ahh... I underestimated it... At least I could scare it off but still I'm badly wounded, and this beast stole most of my food supplies. I have to be more cautious next time.
Oh... I found a meadow here! Finally some open space! I didn't realise how much I missed it!
There is a small bush with grapelike fruits! I'll take some of them!
Here lies an Aetherite rock! Nice!
There is a portable food freezer sticking out of ground! I bet there is still something inside!
I found some scrapped metal stuck in the ground! I'll try to pull it off. Success! This metal is in a pretty good condition. Surely it can be used somewhere in the base.
I went onto a high hill. It's nice to see anything above the trees' leaves.
I see our base from there! That's a sign that my mission goes towards its end!
I see our base from there! That's a sign that my mission goes towards its end!
I can't see any familiar place... This mission is going to end me. I already barely bear it. How long will it last?!
It's still far away from base, but I'm holding good. I'm optimistic about this journey.
It's still far away from base, but I'm holding good. I'm optimistic about this journey.
Great... It looks like it's going to rain...
What's that? I see a strange cloudlike shape. It's a hive of some strange insects!
They are attacking me! This will not be left unanswered! OK, I killed most of them. They look similar to Malaneezes, insects that after some roasting are perfectly eatable and even kind of tasty.
They are attacking me! Ouch! They're biting hard! OK, I killed most of them. They look similar to Malaneezes, insects that after some roasting are perfectly eatable and even kind of tasty.
They fly towards me! Run!... Phew, I lost them. That was close.
They fly towards me! Oh crap, they are to fast! Help!... Ough, they have bitten every inch of my body. My muscles hurt whenever I move. Probably those insects are poisonous.
It seems to be quiet here. Finally some rest.

Oh crap! What is it? A hive of some strange flies surrounded me! They are biting me! Help!... Uhh... They left me alone... Everything is hurting me. They must've been poisonous. My muscle feel paralised.
Shh... What was that sound?
Something moved in behind that bush!
There are some small humanoid creatures! Man, they are so nimble!
They tried to pickpocket me! I couldn't let that happen, and it ended up in a quite physical conflict. They seem to like collecting stuff. I'll take what's remaining.
Hmmm... They craft Aetherite necklaces.
They know how to keep food. Impressing...
I found some kind of sculpture made of Aetherite. Really interesting...
They tried to pickpocket me! They seem to like collecting various items. Fortunetely I was agile enough and didn't let my stuff join their collecttion.
Holy crap! That happened so quickly! There were some small humanoid creatures! And they were so nimble! They just straight up pickpocketed me!
Holy crap! That happened so quickly! There were some small humanoid creatures! And they were so nimble! They just straight up pickpocketed me!
Holy crap! That happened so quickly! There were some small humanoid creatures! And they were so nimble! They just straight up pickpocketed me!
Oh man, there's a cave going straight down. It's very dark there. If only I had a light source I could go down there and search for loot.
Yeah! I've go it!
OK, I've climbed down and... Oh... I don't know what to say... The cave is full of Aetherite! I'll take as much as I can.
The walls are too steep. I don't want to risk. It's not worth it.
Oh Fuck! I fell down! My chest is bursting in pain! I hope none of my ribs are broken... I feel disasterous... Now my only dream is to exit this damned cave.
But I don't have any, so it's pointless to risk especially if there are so steep walls.
Well, nothing interesting in my sight. What a peaceful time.
